name: GameBoy Chocolate factory
description:
This was made in 3 days for the 2018 Game Boy jam 6, it was made solo and used these four colors:

#74ff00
#00b805
#007a04
#004202

I realized that you could put two colors together in a checkered pattern to make more shades.

How to play:

A is to interact with each tab

< > is to change tab

B is to switch between Upgrade tab(bottom Left) and machine Tabs.

You will need to buy cocoa beans then manufacture them into chocolate bars, then you have to wrap them. Each of these processes can be done automatically by the help of the Auto Module you can buy with money and later upgrade!
